page.title: 07CAISTOR TOWN COUNCIL
page.content: { West Lindsey District Council} administers the area from Gainsborough but the local area is controlled by {Caistor Town Council}which meets monthly. The council is elected every 3 years. Council officers nominated after the May 1985 elections were: { Mayor Clr.D.Corbett Deputy Mayor Clr.L.King Chairman Clr.R.Brady Sportsfield Committee Chairman Clr.H.A.Frankish Parks Committee Chairman Clr.M.Drakes Townhall Trustees Committee Chairman Clr.D.Edis Arts Centre Committee Chairman Clr.M.Gaynard
